subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] File uploading rules
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1241973472
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Language: en

Hi Misty, do you by any chance have a link for, ESNIPS  ?
 
 
In a message =
dated 5/10/2009 12:34:25 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
bulletbabea@...=
m writes:

 
 


Sharing is great. You just have to do it to meet this grou=
ps  limitations. 
Most of us just reply via email and attach the files or u=
se  a file sharing 
application such as esnips. I wish yahoo allowed more  =
storage space so we 
could share unlimited amounts of research. They  don't=
 yet but places like 
esnips help us overcome that obstacle. 
 
Misty

--- =
On Sun, 5/10/09, SnowfireL@..., 5/10/09, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:



=
From:  SnowfireL@...<SnowfireL@...>
Subject: Re:  [EVP-ITC] File u=
ploading rules
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsTo: 
Date: Sunday, May 10, 2009, 12:=
08  PM


 
 
Misty, sorry I deleted my folder, and it's contents, I guess I=
  thought you 
folks wanted people to post in there for study or  something=
, you probably 
have enough of your own, sorry,  didn't know. Take care, sf=

 
 
In a message dated 5/10/2009 12:03:25 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
Sn=
owfireL@aol. com writes:

 
 



Thanks for sharing your Gold Wave Kristin,=
 I didn't know how to  get the 
record button to come up at first, I think =
"open" has to be  highlighted 
first?  I don't know what happened to that l=
ittle  red box thing
 
 
In a message dated 5/10/2009 11:49:00 A.M. Eastern=
 Daylight  Time, 
SnowfireL@aol. com writes:

 
 



Hi Kristin, what's the=
 difference between the two  formats?  I don't have a 
clue, I try to do a =
short 5 minutes  session with spirit people last night, 
and when I asked, =
how many  here have met God, I got a few people saying, 
"me" guess, I ask =
 some pretty dump questions, eh" I counted 5 me's, and some 
that  haven't =
I guess.
 
 
In a message dated 5/10/2009 8:32:14 A.M. Eastern Daylight  Ti=
me, 
ckmorris95@sbcgloba l.net writes:

 
 



 
Snow =E2=80=93  In the Gol=
dwave software you can =E2=80=98save as=E2=80=9D mp3.  Directly  under 
the=
 file name in the =E2=80=9CSave As=E2=80=9D where you name your clip is  =
=E2=80=9CFile Format=E2=80=9D.  
Click on the drop down list arrow and MP3 =
 should be your 2nd choice on the 
list.  Click  MP3 and save.  Your file i=
s now in MP3 format.  J   I hope 
this helps.
k

 
  
_____________________=
_______________
 
From:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto: EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups .com ]  On 
Behalf Of  SnowfireL@aol. com
Sent: Sunday, May 10, 2009  1=
:14 AM
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] File  uploading=
 rules


 
 
 





Ok,  Misty I'll take them out, this recording stuff is =
new to  me.

 


 
 
In a  message dated 5/10/2009 1:13:01 A.M. Eastern Day=
light Time,  
bulletbabea@ yahoo.com writes:


 
 
 

 
Please do not uploa=
d wav format  files here they will have to be removed. 
Our group only  has=
 a very limited amount of space. Upload  bigger files and 
mass amount of f=
iles to your esnips.com  accounts or elsewhere to be shared 
here using lin=
ks.  

 


 
Misty

--- On Sat, 5/9/09,  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com < EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups .com  > 
 wrote:










From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups  .com < E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups .com >
Subject:  [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
=
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Saturday, May 9,  2009, 11:50 PM



 
 =

 

Hello,

This email  message is a notification to let you know that
a fi=
le  has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC  
group.

File : /Sn=
owfirel/test1sou nds_like_  three_squeeking_ words.wav

irel  <_SnowfireL@aol. com_ 
(http://us.mc329.mail.yahoo.com/mc/compose?to=
=3DSnowfireL@...) >  
Description : Test1 these are last 3 words, can't=
  make them out, haven't 
changed anything on this one tape  from last nigh=
t aprox. 8 p. the whole tape 
with my mom  on it was around 4 minutes long,=
 seems like these folks  on 
the other side have a lot to say in a short ti=
me.  

You can access this file at the URL:
_http://groups. yahoo.com/  gro=
up/EVP- ITC/files/ Snowfirel/ test1sounds_  
like_three_ squeeking_ words.w=
av_ 
(http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Snowfirel/test1sounds_lik=
e_three_squeeking_words.wav)

group, please  visit:

Regards,

snowfirel  <_SnowfireL@a=
